params._collateralAddress: The address of the collateral token.
params._collateralType: The type of collateral asset to deposit (ERC721, ERC1155).

params._collateralAddress: The address of the collateral token.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._collateralAddress: The address of the collateral contract.
params._recipient: The address to send the assets to.

depositAsset(uint8,address,uint256,uint2.notice: Deposits a collateral asset into the escrow.

depositToken(address,uint256).notice: Deposits a collateral ERC20 token into the escrow.

initialize(uint256).notice: Initializes an escrow.The id of the associated bid.

withdraw(address,uint256,address).notice: Withdraws a collateral asset from the escrow.

documentation.text:
@notice Initializes an escrow.
 @notice The id of the associated bid.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only allowed one asset batch transfer per transaction."

arguments.value: Only allowed one asset batch transfer per transaction.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only allowed one asset batch transfer per transaction."
